page.title: 11LOCAL GOVERNMENT GODMERSHAM
page.content: Godmersham has a parish council of 5 members and with Chilham and Crundale sends one member to the Ashford Borough Council. The members serve for 4 years. They are charged with looking after the civic affairs of the Parish and bringing to the attention of the borough Council any measures needed to improve life in the parish,i.e.street lighting, road repairs, drainage etc. They advise the borough on any local planning applications. The borough provides a mobile library and the parish arranges for a leisure van to come for a few days to amuse the children during the school holidays.
